context_bundle.summary: Carbyne daemon restart procedure. Command: carbyne.exe daemon bridge -d. Fixes stale HWND, dead TCP, and MCP timeout issues.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Kill all carbyne processes: Get-Process carbyne* | Stop-Process -Force  2. Start daemon: X:\carbyne-cli\target\release\carbyne.exe daemon bridge -d  3. Verify: Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 7777  4. Health check: carbyne.exe health
known_errors: carbyne_status MCP times out when daemon dead
Multiple carbyne processes cause port contention
Wrong carbyne.exe (C:\PhiDEX) has no tools configured - use X:\carbyne-cli build
